description: Signals that a player has validated their intent to unequip an item currently in a specific equipment slot. Note: Payloads use IDs for decoupling.

playerEntityId.description: The unique ID of the player entity attempting to unequip.

itemInstanceIdToUnequip.description: The unique ID of the item instance being unequipped.

slotIdToUnequip.description: The identifier of the equipment slot the item is being removed from.
